sentences.english: Lack of specificity for an assay for release may be compensated for by impurities testing.
sentences.chinese: 缺少專屬性數據時可用雜質測試的數據來補償。

sentences.english: No more TPBs of the club comics.
sentences.chinese: 沒有出版俱樂部專屬漫畫合訂本的計劃。

sentences.english: I began trying to isolate these cancer-specific antigens.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我開始嘗試分離這些專屬於癌症的抗原。

sentences.english: The company holds exclusive rights in the intellectual property connected with its goods and services.
sentences.chinese: 公司持有貨物和服務知識產權的專屬權。

sentences.english: Results:TLC method has a better separation and specificity.
sentences.chinese: 結果薄層色譜分離度較好，專屬性強。

sentences.english: Validation criteria should include specificity, and intermediate precision.
sentences.chinese: 驗證項目應當包括專屬性和中間精密度。

sentences.english: It's a little exclusive just because you have to interview to get in.
sentences.chinese: 有一點點專屬，因爲要加入還要通過面試。

sentences.english: The provisions on the establishment and administration of special-purpose institutions will be formulated by the CIRC separately.
sentences.chinese: 專屬機構的設立和管理，由中國保監會另行規定。

sentences.english: Firms gathered data slowly and patchily, through mechanisms not built for the purpose.
sentences.chinese: 企業從非專屬渠道緩慢而零散的收集數據。

sentences.english: The idea that flirtation has become the sole province of females is erroneous;
sentences.chinese: 調情行爲的理念已經成爲女性專屬的領域是不正確的。

sentences.english: Manicures and pedicures are for women.
It can be used for quality control of Carbamazepine tablets.
sentences.chinese: 本法準確可靠，專屬性強，能更好地控制其質量。

sentences.english: Each cycle of magma movement has different characteristics and metallogenic specificity.
sentences.chinese: 各旋迴的岩漿運動有著不同的特點和成礦專屬性。

sentences.english: "Even I don't have my own desk, " says DeHart.
sentences.chinese: “就連我本人也沒有自己專屬的辦公桌，”德哈特稱。

sentences.english: Every decent technological meltdown deserves its own neologism
sentences.chinese: 每一次像樣的技術性崩潰事件都應該有個專屬新詞。

sentences.english: The Connectivity Lounge brings together the convenience of an exclusive mobile office and an atmosphere of complete privacy.
sentences.chinese: 互聯中心兼具移動辦公室的便利和專屬環境的幽謐。
